Function reference

All functions

ElbowPlot()
Plot the elbow plot or scree plot for PCA
SFEMethod() info(<SFEMethod>) is_local(<SFEMethod>) fun(<SFEMethod>) reorganize_fun(<SFEMethod>) args_not_check(<SFEMethod>) is_joint(<SFEMethod>) use_graph(<SFEMethod>) use_matrix(<SFEMethod>)
SFEMethod class
calculateBivariate(<ANY>) calculateBivariate(<SpatialFeatureExperiment>) runBivariate()
Bivariate spatial statistics
calculateMultivariate(<ANY>,<SFEMethod>) calculateMultivariate(<ANY>,<character>) calculateMultivariate(<SpatialFeatureExperiment>,<ANY>) runMultivariate()
Multivariate spatial data analysis
calculateUnivariate(<ANY>,<SFEMethod>) calculateUnivariate(<ANY>,<character>) calculateUnivariate(<SpatialFeatureExperiment>,<ANY>) calculateMoransI(<ANY>) calculateMoransI(<SpatialFeatureExperiment>) colDataUnivariate() colDataMoransI() colGeometryUnivariate() colGeometryMoransI() annotGeometryUnivariate() annotGeometryMoransI() runUnivariate() runMoransI() reducedDimUnivariate() reducedDimMoransI()
Univariate spatial stiatistics
clusterCorrelograms()
Find clusters of correlogram patterns
clusterMoranPlot()
Find clusters on the Moran plot
clusterVariograms()
Cluster variograms of multiple features
colFeatureData() rowFeatureData() geometryFeatureData() reducedDimFeatureData()
Get metadata of colData, rowData, and geometries
ditto_colors
Colorblind friendly palette from dittoSeq
getDivergeRange()
Get beginning and end of palette to center a divergent palette
getParams()
Get parameters used in spatial methods
listSFEMethods()
List all spatial methods in Voyager package
listw2sparse()
Convert listw into sparse adjacency matrix
moranBounds()
Compute the bounds of Moran's I given spatial neighborhood graph
moranPlot()
Use ggplot to plot the moran.plot results
multi_listw2sparse()
Convert multiple listw graphs into a single sparse adjacency matrix
multispati_rsp()
A faster implementation of MULTISPATI PCA
plotCellBin2D()
Plot cell density as 2D histogram
plotColDataBin2D() plotRowDataBin2D()
Plot colData and rowData with 2D histograms
plotColDataFreqpoly() plotRowDataFreqpoly()
Plot frequency polygons for colData and rowData columns
plotColDataHistogram() plotRowDataHistogram()
Plot histograms for colData and rowData columns
plotColGraph() plotAnnotGraph()
Plot spatial graphs
plotCorrelogram()
Plot correlogram
plotCrossVariogram()
Plot cross variogram
plotCrossVariogramMap()
Plot cross variogram map
plotDimLoadings()
Plot top PC loadings of genes
plotGeometry()
Plot geometries without coloring
plotLocalResult()
Plot local results
plotMoranMC()
Plot Moran/Geary Monte Carlo results
plotSpatialFeature()
Plot gene expression in space
plotVariogram()
Plot variogram
plotVariogramMap()
Plot variogram maps
spatialReducedDim()
Plot dimension reduction components in space
.variogram() .variogram_bv() .cross_variogram() .cross_variogram_map() .variogram_map()
Compute variograms
